price: Kò sí ẹ̀mí kan àfi kí ẹ̀ṣọ́ kan wà fún un (nínú àwọn mọlāika).
arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: in kullu nafsin lammā ʿalayhā ḥāfiẓun
